subject: SSN3348
description_text:
Hi
I have previously emailed to say I omitted to include the desktop mounting plate from this order 
Can you please supply separately?
Many thanks
Bev
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Bev Buxton,    I apologize for not receiving your previous email. I see you've placed a new order. Please feel free to contact us anytime if you have any questions.
